member.name: WS_SECURITY_DESCRIPTION
member.summary: The top-level structure used to specify the security requirements for a (on the client side) or a (on the server side).

member.name: WS_SECURITY_DESCRIPTION.securityBindings
member.summary: The array of pointers to security bindings. The set of security bindings supplies determines the kind of security applied to the channel. Each security binding specifies one security token.

member.name: WS_SECURITY_DESCRIPTION.securityBindingCount
member.summary: The count of elements in the securityBindings array.

member.name: WS_SECURITY_DESCRIPTION.properties
member.summary: The array of properties specifying the optional channel-wide security settings. Each in the array is a key-value pair and must use a key defined in . This field can be NULL, and if it is NULL, the default value will be used for each security channel setting.

member.name: WS_SECURITY_DESCRIPTION.propertyCount
member.summary: The count of elements in the properties array.
